markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Golem](/Traits.aspx?ID=220)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 346</row>

Golems are a special type of construct. Golems are immune to almost all magic, but most have a weakness to certain spells.
name: Golem
